summary: Add a standalone vampire follower to the game available for CBBE Vanilla and UNP body
descriptionHtml:
[left][center][size=3][size=6]Vivis Violet the Vampire[/size][/size][size=3]

Add a standalone vampire follower to the game
available for CBBE Vanilla and UNP body
[/size]
[size=3]Name: Vivis Violet
Race: Custom Imperial
